SELECT C.CATEGORY_NAME, A.PAYMENT_STATUS, A.PAYMENT_NO, A.CLASS_NO, A.MEMBER_NO, B.CLASS_TITLE, B.CLASS_CREATE_DT FROM PAYMENT A JOIN CLASS_PAGE B ON(A.CLASS_NO = B.CLASS_NO) JOIN CATEGORY C ON (B.CATEGORY_NO = C.CATEGORY_NO) WHERE A.PAYMENT_STATUS = 'Y' AND A.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY A.CLASS_NO DESC
